Description: A court action resulted in an order requiring Perdue Farms to pay $241,102 in back overtime pay and an additional $64,133 in interest to 177 workers who worked on chicken catching crews at the poultry processor's Lewiston, N.C. plant.
Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
Info Source: https://www.dol.gov/whd/media/press/whd20001103.htm

Info Source: FOIA539

Description: back pay award in unfair labor practices case
Info Source: Extracted from an NLRB dataset covering 1999-2011 downloaded at https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/nlrb-cats-final-c-case-data-bulk-19990101-20110930-in-xml

Description: Under a consent judgment estimated to be worth over $10 million, Perdue Farms Inc. agreed to change current and future pay practices at all of its domestic poultry processing facilities, and compensate more than 25,000 current and former employees for time spent donning and doffing work clothing and protective gear.
Agency: Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
Info Source: https://www.dol.gov/opa/media/press/opa/archive/OPA2002286.htm
https://www.eeoc.gov/eeoc/newsroom/release/5-12-10.cfm

Private Litigation Case Title: Trotter, et al v. Perdue Farms Inc., et al
Heath, et al v. Perdue Farms, Inc.

Description: Perdue Foods was issued a penalty of $77,300 with a cost recovery of $7,601. DNREC approved to offset up to 75% of the penalty for an EIP approved prior to the Conciliation Order issuance. Perdue was required to pay a minimum of $19,325 plus the cost recovery of $7,601 and shall submit evidence of payments for the EIP totalling a minimum of $57,975.
Agency: Delaware Department of Natural Resources and Environmental Control
Info Source: http://www.nav.dnrec.delaware.gov/DEN3/Detail/EnforcementDetail.aspx?id=12410
